MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-NOV-2020 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the TD5 postcode area of Kelso, affecting properties in Sourhope Farm and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.31AM. Our emergency response team is currently onsite carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:07pm on 16th November 2020.
